thread.title: Read this first - for your own sanity and ours !

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Please read the FAQ:
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=3

Please use the search function of the board before you ask a question:
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/search.php

Please post a new topic like this:

Bad:
Headline says: "I have a problem" or "Help"

Good:
Headline says: "Compile error - Leak" or "wglFontBitmaps failed"

Screenshots:

Max width 640 pixels (don't try to be smart and post 640 * 1600 images tho )

Thanks - the management
